text: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhuniyo saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī ti pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhuniyo saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī ti pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 159. Should any bhikkhunī, (acting as part of) a united Community, give robe-cloth (to an individual bhikkhunī) and later complain, "The bhikkhunīs apportion the Community's gains according to friendship," it is to be confessed.
